biotools.summary: cfDNApipe(cell free DNA Pipeline) is an integrated pipeline for analyzing cell-free DNA WGBS/WGS data. It contains many cfDNA quality control and statistical algorithms. It is a comprehensive quality control and analysis pipeline for cell-free DNA high-throughput sequencing data.

bioschemas.name: cfDNApipe
bioschemas.summary: cfDNApipe(cell free DNA Pipeline) is an integrated pipeline for analyzing cell-free DNA WGBS/WGS data. It contains many cfDNA quality control and statistical algorithms. It is a comprehensive quality control and analysis pipeline for cell-free DNA high-throughput sequencing data.
